price: “Kun kennaa keenyaa, kenni! yookiin dhorgadhu! Herreegaan maletti” (janneen).
arabic: هَٰذَا عَطَآؤُنَا فَٱمۡنُنۡ أَوۡ أَمۡسِكۡ بِغَيۡرِ حِسَابٖ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: hādhā ʿaṭāunā fa-um'nun aw amsik bighayri ḥisābin
